nodes.text: Eamus 6 was a terrestrial astronomical object located in the Eamus system, a part of the Southern Core portion of the Core Worlds. It had at least one sun, and occupied the sixth orbital position within the system.

At some point between 2 BBY and 0 BBY, solar flares caused devastating quakes on Eamus 6. In response, the Imperial Senator Leia Organa visited Eamus 6 on her consular starship, the Tantive IV, on a well-publicized mercy mission to bring emergency gear and medical supplies to the celestial body's population.
Eamus 6 was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the astronomical object in grid square L-13.
